# Usage

<!-- This is generated by scripts/generate-usage.sh. Don't edit this file directly. -->

```console
$ ghatm --help
NAME:
   ghatm - Set timeout-minutes to all GitHub Actions jobs. https://github.com/suzuki-shunsuke/ghatm

USAGE:
   ghatm [global options] [command [command options]]

VERSION:
   1.0.0

COMMANDS:
   set         Set timeout-minutes to GitHub Actions jobs which don't have timeout-minutes
   version     Show version
   help, h     Shows a list of commands or help for one command
   completion  Output shell completion script for bash, zsh, fish, or Powershell

GLOBAL OPTIONS:
   --log-level string  log level
   --log-color string  Log color. One of 'auto', 'always' (default), 'never'
   --help, -h          show help
   --version, -v       print the version
```

## ghatm set

```console
$ ghatm set --help
NAME:
   ghatm set - Set timeout-minutes to GitHub Actions jobs which don't have timeout-minutes

USAGE:
   ghatm set

DESCRIPTION:
   Set timeout-minutes to GitHub Actions jobs which don't have timeout-minutes.

   $ ghatm set


OPTIONS:
   --log-level string             log level
   --log-color string             Log color. One of 'auto', 'always' (default), 'never'
   --timeout-minutes int, -t int  The value of timeout-minutes (default: 30)
   --auto, -a                     Estimate the value of timeout-minutes automatically
   --repo string, -r string       GitHub Repository [$GITHUB_REPOSITORY]
   --size int, -s int             Data size (default: 30)
   --help, -h                     show help
```

## ghatm version

```console
$ ghatm version --help
NAME:
   ghatm version - Show version

USAGE:
   ghatm version

OPTIONS:
   --json, -j  Output version in JSON format
   --help, -h  show help
```

## ghatm completion

```console
$ ghatm completion --help
NAME:
   ghatm completion - Output shell completion script for bash, zsh, fish, or Powershell

USAGE:
   ghatm completion

DESCRIPTION:
   Output shell completion script for bash, zsh, fish, or Powershell.
   Source the output to enable completion.

   # .bashrc
   source <(ghatm completion bash)

   # .zshrc
   source <(ghatm completion zsh)

   # fish
   ghatm completion fish > ~/.config/fish/completions/ghatm.fish

   # Powershell
   Output the script to path/to/autocomplete/ghatm.ps1 an run it.


OPTIONS:
   --help, -h  show help
```
